title: summanevaiSNava
sahitya:
summane vaiSNavanembiri para bomma su-jnAnavariyada manujaranu


caraNam 1    mukhava toLedu nAmavaniTTudallade prakaTa shAstrava nAnu nODidene 
mukha shrngArake mAle hAkidenallade bhakuti rasadalli muLugidene
    caraNam 2    Uru mAtugaLa nAnADidenallade nArAyaNa krSNa sharaNendane 
nAriyarige mecci maruLAdenallade guru hiriyarige nA namisidenEnayya
    caraNam 3    jagatu satyavemba pancabhEdava tiLidu rAgadvESagaLembudanu varjisi 
bhagavantanali shravaNa sankIrtaneyinda nigama gOcaranendu tiLidenEnayya
    caraNam 4    nararAtumadindadhika gandarvadindadhika surapanindadhika bhavagadhika 
sarasvatigadhika virinci sirigadhika hari sarvOttamanendu tiLidenEnayya
    caraNam 5    gangeyali mai maNNa toLede nAnallade hingade snAnava mADidene 
ranga purandara viTTalana dAsara sangava biDade nAniddenEnayya
